title.rendered: Ravindra Jadeja gifts his IPL 2023 final bat to teammate Ajay Mandal, he shares pic

content.rendered:
The bat Ajay Mandal used to score 10 runs in the final two deliveries to help CSK win the IPL 2023 final was a gift from Ravindra Jadeja, the all-rounder for CSK revealed on Instagram Stories.

He merely gave me that bat as a gift. Huge gratitude to CSK for allowing me to use Jaddu bhai’s changing room, he wrote.
